resources.string: Image of a very adorable puppy
I have read and accept the

1. Introduction. Welcome to Mascotas Felices. By downloading, installing, and using our application, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions of Use. If you do not agree with these terms, you should not use the application.
2. Use of the Application. The Mascotas Felices application is designed to help users manage the care of their pets. The use of the application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose is prohibited.

3. User Registration. To access certain features of the application, you may need to register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your device. You accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
4. Privacy. We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

5. Intellectual Property. All intellectual property rights of the application and its content (except for content provided by users) are owned by Mascotas Felices or its licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from our content without our express consent.

6. User Content. You are responsible for the content you post on the application. You must not post content that is illegal, offensive, defamatory, or infringes the rights of others. We reserve the right to remove any content we deem inappropriate.

7. Limitation of Liability. The application is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that the application will be error-free or uninterrupted. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the application.

8. Changes to the Terms. We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions of Use at any time. Changes will be effective when posted on the application. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically to stay informed of any changes.
9. Termination. We may suspend or terminate your access to the application at any time, without prior notice, if we believe you have violated these Terms and Conditions of Use.

10. Governing Law. These Terms and Conditions of Use will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the country in which we operate. Any dispute arising in connection with these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that country.
11. Contact. If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions of Use, please contact us at sarahdelgado36@gmail.com.
